newsitem.title: USA: Norfolk Southern repeats CSX deal anticompetitive.
newsitem.headline: Norfolk Southern repeats CSX deal anticompetitive.

text.p: Norfolk Southern Corp, which last week launched an unsolicited bid for Conrail, Wednesday wrote to its customers reiterating its view that CSX Corp's proposed acquisition of Conrail would be anticompetitive.

"Significant market dominance would exist across all industry sectors with a CSX/Conrail combination," Norfolk Southern said in a letter to shippers on its Internet home page. As an example, it noted that a combined CSX/Conrail would serve about 110 power generating plants, while Norfolk Southern would serve 39.
